home.title: VCS
home.welcome: Welcome to VCS – your partner for custom woodwork, bespoke furniture, and high-quality interior fittings. Discover our passion for craftsmanship!
home.intro1: As a student organization based in Zurich, we design living and working spaces with function, quality, and style. Our range of services includes academic support, networking events, and professional development – all implemented professionally, precisely, and with state-of-the-art resources.
home.intro2: Whether you're a student, faculty member, or industry professional, we invite you to explore our offerings and join our vibrant community. Let's shape the future of chemistry together!
